about_me_text: I am a DJ with years of experience. I have played at hundreds of weddings, events, and parties, making each one unique.
offer_introduce: All bookings include a complimentary pre-event consultation to discuss your music preferences, special requests, and event timeline. Additional services like photo booths, custom lighting designs, and MC services are available upon request
offer_1_text: I will provide the best music for your event.
offer_2_text: Professional sound system ensuring crystal-clear audio.
offer_3_text: Spectacular lighting to create a unique atmosphere.
offer_4_text: Engaging activities to bring energy and fun to any party.
sounds_info: Professional audio equipment ensuring crystal clear sound quality for your event.
footer_description: Professional DJ services for weddings, parties and corporate events
emailInfo: Have questions or want to book our services? Send us a message and we'll respond within 24 hours.
emailSentMail: Thank you! Your message has been sent successfully.
emailText: Your Message (Event date, type, and any special requests)
privacy_policy_contact_form_description: When you use our contact form, we collect your name and email address to respond to your inquiry. Providing this data is voluntary but necessary to respond to your message.
privacy_policy_data_purpose_content: Your personal data provided through the contact form will be processed solely for the purpose of responding to your inquiry and for possible future communication related to your initial message.
privacy_policy_data_retention_content: We will store your personal data for the period necessary to handle your inquiry and for a maximum of 12 months thereafter for archival purposes, unless you request earlier deletion.
privacy_policy_rights_content: You have the right to access your data, request correction, deletion, or restriction of processing. You may also object to the processing of your data. To exercise these rights, please contact us using the details provided above.
privacy_policy_security_content: We implement appropriate technical and organizational measures to ensure the security of your personal data, including protection against unauthorized access and accidental loss.
privacy_policy_changes_content: We reserve the right to modify this privacy policy. Any changes will be published on this page.
